name: Color Runner (xxKobalxx)
description:
An infinite runner built for Mini Jam 62 with the theme "Colors"!

Move up, down, left, and right to hit the colored brick while avoiding the white bricks. Then switch colors to match the brick you're going to hit! Will you get the highest score?

-- CONTROLS --

WASD - Move the ball in any direction, not holding anything down will return you to the center.

LEFT & RIGHT ARROWS - Change the balls color, hold left for green, right for blue, neither for red.

ESCAPE - Exits the game and returns you to the main menu.
